attributes.action: Save Bentley Priory,Battle of Britain HQ
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During the Battle of Britain,Bentley Priory,in Stanmore,Middlesex, was Hugh Dowdings and 11 Groups Headquarters.
It is the spirtual home of Fighter Command and the remaining survivors of 'The Few'
The Ministry of Defence has sold the Priory to developers, they are to convert the Priory into high value appartments and build many more in the grounds.
At the very least,legislation is needed to save the whole of the ground floor from the developers,so it can become a lasting memorial to the men and women who saved this country and the world,from Nazi tyranny.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save Bentley Priory,Battle of Britain HQ."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19852


Prime Minister's Office
